landing.greetingMsg: Welcome to Catena-X - The Automotive Network
landing.heading1: Please finish the following application form to complete the registration of your company for Catena-X
landing.point1: The registration form consists of 5 steps and will take approximately 5-10 minutes of your time
landing.point2: To finish the registration in one run, we propose to ensure that you have the commercial register form of your company handy. If you don't have the form, you can invite the right person in your company to support the registration and upload the form.
landing.point3: You can pause the registration at any time. Re-connect to your registration status by using the login data which you received via e-mail.
landing.footerText1: More information can get found in the

registration.subHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to join Catena-X - Automotive Network Portal.
registration.regiStep: Register to Catena-X by entering all information requested in the following 5 steps
registration.regiSubHeading: Please finish the company onboarding by finishing the following tasks to actively participate and use all functions in the Catena-X Automotive Network Portal.
registration.statusApplicationError: Application ID not existing. Please contact the administrator.
registration.apiError: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact the administrator.

registrationStepOne.verifyCompayDataSubHeading: Please add your legal entity company data below. For a quick and easy data entering, use your company business partner number (BPN) to automatically retrieve all necessary information. If you don't have a BPN so far, you can enter the company data manually.
registrationStepOne.seachDatabase: Search for your company data by BPN to autofill the relevant data fields
registrationStepOne.bpnTooltip: Displays the Business Partner Number and can't get edited.
registrationStepOne.helperText: In case you enter your data manually, this field fill be locked.
registrationStepOne.bpnInvalidError: The BPN is invalid, please enter a valid BPN or use the manual flow below. Hint: A BPN has 16-digits.
registrationStepOne.bpnNotExistError: This BPN doesn't exist, please enter a valid BPN or use the manual flow below.
registrationStepOne.legalEntityError: Please enter a valid legal entity name.
registrationStepOne.registeredNameError: Please enter a valid registered name.
registrationStepOne.streetHouseNumberError: Please enter a valid street and house number
registrationStepOne.regionError: Please enter a valid region. Hint: ISO 3166-2 region code with 1 to 3 letters or numbers.
registrationStepOne.postalCodeError: Please enter a valid postal code
registrationStepOne.cityError: Please enter a valid city name
registrationStepOne.countryError: Please enter a valid country code. Hint: country codes are 2 alpha letters.
registrationStepOne.identifierhelperText: We have retrieved two registered identifiers. Please select the preferred identifier for your company registration.
registrationStepOne.IN_COMMERCIAL_REG_NUMBER: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with hyphen with 4 to 21 digits.
registrationStepOne.IN_VAT_ID: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with hyphen with 5 to 15 digits.
registrationStepOne.IN_LEI_CODE: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with exact 20 digits.
registrationStepOne.DE_COMMERCIAL_REG_NUMBER: Please enter a valid identifier. Hint: Starting with court name or code and followed by registered identifier. Examples: Mannheim HRB 98814, München HRB 175450, F1103R_HRB98814.
registrationStepOne.DE_VAT_ID: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Starting with DE and followed by 9 digit numbers
registrationStepOne.DE_LEI_CODE: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with exact 20 digits.
registrationStepOne.FR_COMMERCIAL_REG_NUMBER: Please enter a valid number. Hint: SIREN with 9 digits. Examples: 383474814, 443061841.
registrationStepOne.FR_VAT_ID: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with hyphen and space with 8 to 15 digits.
registrationStepOne.FR_LEI_CODE: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with exact 20 digits.
registrationStepOne.MX_COMMERCIAL_REG_NUMBER: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with hyphen with 4 to 21 digits.
registrationStepOne.MX_VAT_ID: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with hyphen and & with 12 to 13 digits.
registrationStepOne.MX_LEI_CODE: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with exact 20 digits.
registrationStepOne.Worldwide_COMMERCIAL_REG_NUMBER: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with hyphen with 4 to 21 digits.
registrationStepOne.Worldwide_VAT_ID: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with hyphen and space with 5 to 18 digits.
registrationStepOne.Worldwide_LEI_CODE: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Alphanumeric with exact 20 digits.
registrationStepOne.Worldwide_EORI: Please enter a valid number. Hint: Starting with country code and followed by up to 15 alphanumeric characters.
registrationStepOne.submitError: Something went wrong. Your entered data could not get saved. Please try again later or contact the administrator.

finish.greetingMsg: Your registration has been successfully submitted!
finish.point1: You, as well as added Legal Managers, will receive a e-mail with all the details of your registration form
finish.point2: We will validate your registration request. As soon as your registration is approved (usually within 2 working days), you will receive a e-mail confirmation
finish.point3: As soon as you received the confirmation e-mail, you will be able to connect to the portal and procceed with the technical onboarding

companyRole.title: The role of your company
companyRole.subTitle: Please select one or several company roles with which you want to act/participate in the Catena-X network. The company role can always get updated/changed later. Depending on the selected role, the offered portal services might differ.
companyRole.NoRolesError1: An error occured. No roles found.
companyRole.NoRolesError: An error occured. No roles found. Please {{ retry }} or contact the system administrator.
companyRole.submitError: Please agree to all Terms & Conditions of the selected company role(s) before proceeding to the next step.

documentUpload.title: Upload documents
documentUpload.subTitle: Please upload your legal company commercial register document as well as the conformity approval (if app/service provider role was selected). Please ensure to upload a pdf document only with limited document size of < 8MB.
documentUpload.dragDropMessage: Drag and drop files here, or click to select files
documentUpload.dragDropExceedSizeErrorMsg: Please select another document. The maximum upload size is limited to 1MB
documentUpload.dragDropDocumentTypeErrorMsg: The selected document type is not supported. Please upload a document with the type .pdf
documentUpload.dragDropExceedFilesCountErrorMsg: You can only upload up to {{MAX_FILES}} documents.
documentUpload.deleteError: Document does not exist. Deletion unsuccessful. Please try it later again.

Responsibility.subTitle: OPTIONAL. You can add additional persons to join the registration process. This is not mandatory and can get skipped if not needed.
Responsibility.emailErrorMessage: Please enter a valid email address
Responsibility.hint: Provide a personal message (optional) to address your need to the invited person.
Responsibility.userInviteSubHeading: No users defined, please use the form below to add users:
Responsibility.personalNoteError: Please enter a valid personal note

wallet.title: Connect your own wallet
wallet.subtitle: Use your own Catena-X-compliant wallet if you already have one.If you don’t or are unsure, you can skip this step. We will provide you with a wallet to use in the Catena-X dataspace.
wallet.userAgreementText: I have a Catena-X-compliant wallet and will provide the wallet’s DID.
wallet.issuerCredsInfo: To ensure automatic issuance of credentials, please make sure your own wallet trusts the issuer's DID:

verifyRegistration.title: Verify your registration data
verifyRegistration.subtitle: Verify your company registration data before submitting the registration. Please ensure that all information are correctly filled. As soon as the verification is finished, click the 'Submit' button below to submit the registration for approval.
verifyRegistration.submitErrorMessage: The submission was unsuccessful. Please try it later again

ErrorMessage.401: User role load failed. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.403: User role load failed. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.404: Service error. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.405: Method not supported. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.409: Service error. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.415: Service error. Please contact your administrator.
ErrorMessage.500: This Page isn't working. Server Error.
ErrorMessage.error1: Registration form cant get submitted, since company data are missing. Please fill out all company data in Step 1.
ErrorMessage.error2: Registration form cant get submitted. CX Terms and Conditions need to get accepted. Please accept the Terms and Conditions under Step 3 to proceed.
ErrorMessage.error3: Registration form cant get submitted. Please upload your company document under Step 4.

FooterContent.Footer1: Please enter all the required information before proceeding.
